SELECT
FROM AC_FUNC d, AC_MENU e WHERE e.GUID_FUNC = d.GUID AND e.GUID_APP = #{appGuid} AND d.GUID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT (c.GUID_FUNC) FROM AC_ROLE_FUNC c, AC_OPERATOR_ROLE b, AC_OPERATOR a WHERE a.USER_ID = #{userId} AND b.GUID_OPERATOR = a.GUID AND c.GUID_ROLE = b.GUID_ROLE )

SELECT
FROM AC_OPERATOR_IDENTITYRES a, AC_ROLE_FUNC b, AC_MENU e WHERE a.GUID_IDENTITY = #{identityGuid} AND a.GUID_AC_RESOURCE = b.GUID_ROLE AND e.GUID_APP = #{appGuid} and e.GUID_FUNC = b.GUID_FUNC
mapper.sql: e.guid as guid ,e.guid_app as guidApp ,e.guid_func as guidFunc ,e.menu_name as menuName ,e.menu_label as menuLabel ,e.menu_code as menuCode ,e.isleaf as isleaf ,e.ui_entry as uiEntry ,e.menu_level as menuLevel ,e.guid_parents as guidParents ,e.guid_root as guidRoot ,e.display_order as displayOrder ,e.image_path as imagePath ,e.expand_path as expandPath ,e.menu_seq as menuSeq ,e.open_mode as openMode ,e.sub_count as subCount
